column4: sometimes after installing software you need to refresh the Gnome Menu (do the installed apps appear after a reboot or logoff-login?)  I sometimes use xkill on the menu to get the changes right away (not really recommended)
what program is not showing up?  did you install it from apt/aptitude/synaptic/USC ?
do you see an Other category in your menu?  are they in there perhaps?
I'm not that stupid :)  No other categories.
